title: Builtup area required for development of public amenities / reservations shall not be counted while computing permissible FSI under URS
clause_text: Builtup area required for development of public amenities / reservations shall not be counted while computing permissible FSI under URS. If URS includes areas falling under CRZ and Forest, subject to NOCs of the concerned Authority, these areas may be considered against the compulsory open space to be kept as per DCR.
section: (#) Development of Reservations contemplated in Development Plan falling in the area of URC â€“
